base_description: Metal folding chair, black seat and backrest.
part_description: Four metal legs, one seat, one backrest. Legs fold inward, seat and backrest are flat and rectangular. Black padding on seat and backrest.
internal_interaction_description: The folding mechanism allows the legs to pivot inward, aligning parallel to the seat for compact storage. The backrest is connected to the frame, providing support when unfolded. The seat is fixed to the frame, ensuring stability when in use.
external_interaction_description: The chair can be easily carried and stored due to its lightweight and foldable design. It provides seating for individuals and can be used in various settings such as events, gatherings, or additional home seating. The metal frame offers durability and support for different body weights.
